headline: A Look At KKR (KKR) Valuation As Private Credit Jitters Weigh On Alternative Asset Managers
summary: KKR (KKR) is back in focus as a broad selloff in software spills into business development companies and alternative asset managers, sharpening investor attention on private credit exposure and potential redemption pressures. See our latest analysis for KKR. That shift in sentiment has shown up clearly in KKR’s chart, with a 1 day share price return of 3.12% decline, a 30 day share price return of 19.29% decline and a year to date share price return of 27.37% decline.
